title: El hmiza
description: An App Market Place Where you can list your properties , sell or buy them

title: Gsyndic
description: The Condominium Management Application powered by Laravel is a robust and user-friendly solution that revolutionizes the management of condominiums and residential communities. It provides a comprehensive platform for condominium boards, property managers, and residents to efficiently handle various aspects of condominium living, enhancing transparency, communication, and organization.

title: GreenWorks
description: A Market Place where you can list Your items to sell or buy recyclable items from others
